data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Vega Baja, Puerto Rico to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vega Baja, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Vega Baja.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 16,289 believers in Vega Baja that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Vega Baja, Puerto Rico that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Miranda
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Miranda, Vega Baja, Puerto Rico.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Vega Baja, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Vega Baja, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Vega Baja, Puerto Rico so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
